name: flappy bird clone (vyshnovka)
description:
This is a clone of the legendary Flappy Bird on Unity.

The original game is pretty simple - hyper-casual, obviously. Just tap the screen, jump over obstacles and last as long as possible. I bet you won't score more than 10 points.

 

 

This is my very first project on Unity. Ever. And let it be tiny and incredibly simple - it is mine and it is a memory.

So just bear with it being here.

 

If in need, take a look at the source code.
